fldDefinition: A variable in which the following text or commands are printed
The $ indicates a variable within PHP
Prints a list of all items within the parentheses in the order they appear
Opens a file and reads the information from it
In the context of a form, indicates there is an error in what the user has typed
Opening tag to indicate the beginning of PHP code
Closing tag to indicate end of PHP code
Includes another file within your PHP document such as a header, top, footer, etc.
A semi-colon ends all lines of PHP, similar to CSS
